content: belgian waffles a hat pattern by keelin sweeney tools 1 skein of stitch nation by debbie stroller alpaca love 132 yds or any other worsted weight *you will not use all of the skein i had about 10yds leftover 1 size 9 16 inch circular needle 1 set size 9 dpns or a longer needle for magic looping gauge 17st by 28 row = 4 inches waffle stitch row 1 *k2 p2* repeat * to end row 2 knit row 3 *k2 p2* row 4-6 knit directions on 16in circular needle cast on 84 stitches knit in waffle stitch pattern for 5 inches begin decreases row 1 *k10 k2tog* repeat * to end row 2 knit row 3 *k9 k2tog* repeat * to end row 4 knit row 5 *k8 k2tog* repeat * to end row 6 knit row 7 *k7 k2tog* repeat * to end row 8 knit row 9 *k6 k2tog* repeat * to end row 10 knit row 11 *k5 k2tog* repeat * to end row 12 knit row 13 *k4 k2tog* repeat * to end row 14 *k3 k2tog* repeat * to end row 15 *k2 k2tog* repeat * to end row 16 *k1 k2tog* repeat * to end row 17 *k2tog* repeat * to end cut yarn and thread tail through live stitches weave in all ends
